Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits the use of official position for political fundraising
Summary: Prohibits the use or exploitation of official position by an officer or employee of a state agency for political fundraising as a standard of ethics for state employees; makes unlawful use of official position, in the first or second degree, to engage in political fundraising a class E felony and class A misdemeanor, respectively.
LawCode: Amd §74, Pub Off L; add §§200.28 & 200.29, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the penal law, in relation to prohibiting the use of an official position for political fundraising
